reviewText: not real 3d . after freeze framing any scene and closing right eye , then left eye there is no  difference between close up and background  indicating the 3d was encoded on the signal and maybe the menu but not the movies . also part one the  "36th chamber" ( a.k.a. Master Killer ) is region B locked . and part 2 and 3 are region free .no english track on this .
